column4: hello #ubuntu, I finally got my usb wifi to work under Ubuntu....and it connects fine tho it signal is at 17% where under windows its at like 70% so under ubuntu the Internet stops and starts hardout...Its using WPA Personal, Does anyone have any ideas on what I can try to make ubuntu get the better signal...?
Even tho WICD will let me configure it using a good GUI, will it improve the signal?
